Package oh_hecc.mvc.model_bits

Class PassageLinkObject

java.lang.Object
oh_hecc.mvc.model_bits.AbstractObject
oh_hecc.mvc.model_bits.EditModelObject
oh_hecc.mvc.model_bits.PassageLinkObject
public class PassageLinkObject
extends EditModelObject
Okay so this is basically an object that represents a link from one PassageObject to another.

    • PassageLinkObject

      PassageLinkObject​(EditModelInterface model, PassageObject sourceObject, java.util.UUID destinationUUID)
      Constructor for the PassageLinkObject
      Parameters:
      model - the EditModelInterface object that this object appears in
      sourceObject - the source PassageObject that this 'link' is 'from'.
      destinationUUID - the UUID of the PassageEditingInterface/PassageObject that this 'link' effectively 'links' to.
